description: R package with helper functions for writing CODECHECK certificates about code executions as part of peer review, see https://codecheck.org.uk. Also includes functions for managing the CODECHECK register at https://codecheck.org.uk/register.
title: codecheck R package: Helper Functions for CODECHECK Project
